title: AED Training Implementation and Impact Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CPR) and Fundamental Principles of First Aid
context.additional_context: Parallel implementation of simulation training using digital devices (tablets/smartphones) and hands-on practice with actual AED models

learning_goals: Learners can identify structural differences among various AED models and explain the functions of each component (cover, electrodes, buttons)
Learners can perform defibrillation within 40 seconds using an unfamiliar AED model in a simulated environment
Learners can analyze psychological barriers (confusion, anxiety) that occur during AED use and propose strategies to overcome them

resources: Three Types of AED Training Models

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
